verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) O <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H8416>praise,<s%> Do not be <S%H2790>silent!<s%>

For they have <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me; They have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> me with a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>
They have also <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> me with <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H8135>hatred,<s%> And <S%H3898>fought<s%> against me <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause.<s%>
In <S%H8478>return<s%> for my <S%H160>love<s%> they <S%H7853>act<s%> as my <S%H7853>accusers;<s%> But I am [in] <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>
Thus they have <S%H7760>repaid<s%> me <S%H9567>evil<s%> for <S%H9186>good,<s%> And <S%H8135>hatred<s%> for my <S%H160>love.<s%>
<S%H6485>Appoint<s%> a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him; And let an <S%H7854>accuser<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> at his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand.<s%>
When he is <S%H8199>judged,<s%> let him <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H7563>guilty;<s%> And let his <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H2401>sin.<s%>
Let his <S%H3117>days<s%> be <S%H4592>few;<s%> Let <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H6486>office.<s%>
Let his <S%H1121>children<s%> be <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> And his <S%H802>wife<s%> a <S%H490>widow.<s%>
Let his <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5128>wander<s%> about and <S%H7592>beg;<s%> And let them <S%H1875>seek<s%> [sustenance] far from their <S%H2723>ruined<s%> <S%H2723>homes.<s%>
Let the <S%H5383>creditor<s%> <S%H5367>seize<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that he has; And let <S%H2114>strangers<s%> <S%H962>plunder<s%> the <S%H3018>product<s%> of his <S%H3018>labor.<s%>
Let there be <S%H408>none<s%> to <S%H4900>extend<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to him, <S%H408>Nor<s%> any to be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to his <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> <S%H3490>children.<s%>
Let his <S%H319>posterity<s%> be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off;<s%> In a <S%H312>following<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> let their <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out.

Let the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of his fathers be <S%H1>remembered<s%> <S%H2142>before<s%> the <S%H413>Lord,<s%> And do not let the <S%H3068>sin<s%> of his <S%H9128>mother<s%> be <S%H517>blotted<s%> out.
Let them be <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> That He may <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> their <S%H2143>memory<s%> from the <S%H776>earth;<s%>

<S%H3282>Because<s%> he did not <S%H2142>remember<s%> to <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> But <S%H7291>persecuted<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> And the <S%H3512>despondent<s%> in <S%H3824>heart,<s%> to <S%H4191>put<s%> [them] to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
He also <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H7045>cursing,<s%> so it <S%H935>came<s%> to him; And he did not <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H1293>blessing,<s%> so it was <S%H7368>far<s%> from him.

But he <S%H3847>clothed<s%> himself with <S%H7045>cursing<s%> as with his <S%H4055>garment,<s%> And it <S%H935>entered<s%> into his <S%H7130>body<s%> like <S%H4325>water,<s%> And like <S%H8081>oil<s%> into his <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
Let it be to him as a <S%H899>garment<s%> with which he <S%H5844>covers<s%> himself, And for a <S%H9253>belt<s%> with which he <S%H8548>constantly<s%> <S%H2296>girds<s%> himself.

Let <S%H384>this<s%> be the <S%H6468>reward<s%> of my <S%H7853>accusers<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And of those who <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H9563>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

But Thou, O <S%H3068>God,<s%> the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H6213>deal<s%> [kindly] with me for Thy name's <S%H4616>sake;<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me;
For I am <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H34>needy,<s%> And my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H9135>wounded<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me.
I am <S%H1980>passing<s%> like a <S%H6738>shadow<s%> when it <S%H5186>lengthens;<s%> I am <S%H5287>shaken<s%> <S%H5287>off<s%> like the <S%H697>locust.<s%>
My <S%H1290>knees<s%> are <S%H3782>weak<s%> from <S%H6685>fasting;<s%> And my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> has <S%H3584>grown<s%> <S%H3584>lean,<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H8081>fatness.<s%>
I also have <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to them; When they <S%H7200>see<s%> me, they <S%H5128>wag<s%> their <S%H7218>head.<s%>
<S%H5826>Help<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H3467>Save<s%> me according to Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness.<s%>
And let them <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H384>this<s%> is Thy <S%H3027>hand;<s%> Thou, <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> hast <S%H6213>done<s%> it.
Let them <S%H7043>curse,<s%> but do Thou <S%H1288>bless;<s%> When they <S%H6965>arise,<s%> they shall be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> But Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall be <S%H8055>glad.<s%>
Let my <S%H7853>accusers<s%> be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H3639>dishonor,<s%> And let them <S%H5844>cover<s%> themselves with their own <S%H1322>shame<s%> as with a <S%H4598>robe.<s%>

With my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> I will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> <S%H3966>abundantly<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> And in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> Him.
For He <S%H5975>stands<s%> at the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H34>needy,<s%> To <S%H3467>save<s%> him from those who <S%H8199>judge<s%> his <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
